content.rendered:
Steamed sweet potatoes are favorite foods, you can use them instead of breakfast. The Steaming of potatoes take a long time so frozen steamed sweet potato is the preferred product.

Sweet potatoes are an agricultural plant with large tuberous roots, high in starch, sweet, contain a lot of digestive fibers, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin B6, they are used in the role of both vegetables and food. Sweet potato leaves are also used as a vegetable. (see: Frozen Sweet Potato Leaves)

Japanese Sweet Potatoes are harvested and packed in plastic bags or in plastic baskets and shipped to the factory.

Devoured, damaged tubers will be removed, good tubers will be placed in baskets and waiting to be washed.

The sweet potatoes will be washed with automatic machines. If the product are not peeled, the machine will be adjusted so that the washing process does not peel off its shell.

After washing them, they are placed in a large steam machine and steamed until fully cooked

The steamed sweet potatoes will be kept, the cracked, or overcooked ones will go out.

Steamed Japanese Sweet Potatoes

The steamed sweet potatoes are placed in bags with weight according to customer requirements and vacuum packaging.

Frozen Steamed Sweet Potatoes (Whole/Unpeeled) are frozen at a temperature of -40 to -35oC and have a shelf life of 24 months, if they are stored at -18oC.
